feed.title: Linkding Injector Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Linkding Injector: v1.3.0
entry.content:
• [feature] New search engine: SearX/SearXNG*
  • [feature] New search engine: Brave Search
  • [enhancement] New logo
  • [enhancement] manifest v3 support (in chrome)

* experimental, please read this if you have problems

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Fivefold/linkding-injector/compare/v1.2.0...v1.3.0

entry.title: New release for Linkding Injector: v1.3.1
New release for Linkding Injector: v1.3.2
entry.content:
• [bug] Fixed a bug where no results where shown if several URL parameters were in a GET request (see #18)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Fivefold/linkding-injector/compare/v1.3.1...v1.3.2

entry.title: New release for Linkding Injector: v1.3.3
entry.content:
• [feature] New search engine: Kagi. Thank you, @danbush (see #21)
  • [enhancement] Improved theme detection and backend code improvements. Thank you, @Sevichecc (see #19 and #20)
  • [bug] Fixed broken Brave Search support (see #22)
  • [bug] Fixed a bug where a fresh installation wouldn't work because there was no saved configuration.

New Contributors

  • @Sevichecc made their first contribution in https://github.com/Fivefold/linkding-injector/pull/19
  • @danbush made their first contribution in https://github.com/Fivefold/linkding-injector/pull/21

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Fivefold/linkding-injector/compare/v1.3.2...v1.3.3
